br5e.migrating: Applying Better Rolls System Migration for version {version}

rollButtonsEnabled.name: Add Roll Buttons to Sheet
rollButtonsEnabled.hint: Adds buttons to items, spells, and features in the sheet, which display when the item is expanded. May be incompatible with the Item Sheet Buttons mod. Requires reopening the sheet.

imageButtonEnabled.name: Make Item Image Auto-roll
imageButtonEnabled.hint: When clicking on an item's image, output a Better Roll message to chat instead of the normal chat output. Can be bypassed by holding Alt when clicking.

quickDefaultDescriptionEnabled.name: Quick Roll Description Enabled by Default
quickDefaultDescriptionEnabled.hint: If enabled, weapons and tools will have their descriptions show by default on quick rolls. Only affects new weapons and tools, as other item types already have descriptions enabled by default.

defaultRollArt.name: Use Default Art
defaultRollArt.hint: Determines which art is used by default for ability checks and saving throws. If this is not available (or is the default mystery man icon), it will use the other icon instead.

damageContextEnabled.name: Damage Context Labels
damageContextEnabled.hint: Allows entering context for damage labels, which precede the damage type. Only works on Better Rolls.

contextReplacesTitle.name: Context Replaces Title Label
contextReplacesTitle.hint: If a context label is in the same place as a damage roll's title label, such as "Damage" or "Healing", it will replace it.

contextReplacesDamage.name: Context Replaces Damage Type
contextReplacesDamage.hint: If a context label is in the same place as a damage type label, it will replace it.

rollTitlePlacement.name: Show Roll Title Labels
rollTitlePlacement.hint: Determines if a non-damage roll's title, such as "Attack", appear.

damageTitlePlacement.name: Show Damage Title Labels
damageTitlePlacement.hint: Determines if a damage roll's title, such as "Damage", appears.

damageContextPlacement.name: Show Damage Context Labels
damageContextPlacement.hint: Determines if and where a damage roll's context label appears.

damageRollPlacement.name: Show Damage Type Labels
damageRollPlacement.hint: Determines where the damage type label is placed, relative to a damage roll.

altSecondaryEnabled.name: Alt-Click Image for Secondary Roll
altSecondaryEnabled.hint: When Alt-clicking on an item's image, output a second Better Roll message which can be configured separately per-item. Overwrites ability to bypass with default chat output.

chatDamageButtonsEnabled.name: Enable Chat Damage Buttons
chatDamageButtonsEnabled.hint: Renders buttons on Better Rolls damage rolls that apply damage to selected tokens. Requires refreshing Foundry.

playRollSounds.name: Enable Roll Sounds
playRollSounds.hint: Plays a dice-rolling sound when a Better Rolls message is sent to chat. Wlll not play if Maestro's Item Track are enabled.

hideDC.name: Hide Save DCs
hideDC.hint: Determines if the DC is hidden on save DC buttons on Better Rolls.

damagePromptEnabled.name: Damage Prompt In Chat Card
damagePromptEnabled.hint: Do not autoroll damage, instead show a damage button if there is an attack roll or saving throw.

d20RollIconsEnabled.name: Show D20 die icon for multi rolls
d20RollIconsEnabled.hint: If enabled, attacks, checks, and saves show natural die roll

applyActiveEffects.name: Show DAE Active Effects Button
applyActiveEffects.hint: Show button to apply active effects. The DAE module is required. If DAE is not installed, this option will not do anything.

d20Mode.name: d20 Mode
d20Mode.hint: Determines how attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws are shown. If set to Single Roll, also enables [-]/[+] roll overlay buttons for advantage and disadvantage.

choices.1: Single Roll Upgradeable (Shift Adv, Ctrl Disadv)
choices.3: ゴゴ Triple Threat ゴゴ

critBehavior.name: Critical Damage
critBehavior.hint: Determines how critical damage is calculated.

choices.4: Max Base Damage, Roll Critical Damage

critString.name: Critical Indicator
critString.hint: Determines how criticals are labeled. Appears as text to the right of the critical damage roll. Only works on Better Rolls.

error.noSelectedActor: Must have a character selected to use this macro!
error.noKnownItemOnActor: does not own an item named
error.noActorWithId: No actor is known with that ID
error.noActorWithName: No actor is known with that name
error.noItemWithId: No item is known with that ID on actor
error.noChargesLeft: This item has run out of charges!
error.autoDestroy: The {name} disappears as its last charge is consumed.
error.noDAE: DAE is required to apply active effects to targets

critDamage.hint: Extra Critical Damage to apply when at least one damage is rolled

settings.quickRollsAltSubLabel: (When holding Alt during a quick roll)
settings.label: Label

fullDamage.hint: Click to apply full damage to selected token(s).

halfDamage.hint: Click to apply half damage to selected token(s).

doubleDamage.hint: Click to apply double damage to selected token(s).

healing.hint: Click to apply full healing to selected token(s).
